com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap

Class TypefaceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.TypefaceProvider

  • public class TypefaceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds static instances of Typefaces, and IconSets, allowing views to use them across the application without expensive initialisation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TypefaceProvider() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Collection<IconSet> getRegisteredIconSets()
      Retrieves a collection of all registered IconSets in the application
      static Typeface getTypeface(Context context, IconSet iconSet)
      Returns a reference to the requested typeface, creating a new instance if none already exists
      static void registerCustomIconSet(IconSet iconSet)
      Registers a custom IconSet, so that it is available for use throughout the whole application.
      static void registerDefaultIconSets()
      Registers instances of the Default IconSets so that they are available throughout the whole application.
      static IconSet retrieveRegisteredIconSet(java.lang.String fontPath, boolean editMode)
      Retrieves a registered IconSet whose font can be found in the asset directory at the given path

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TypefaceProvider

        public TypefaceProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeface

        public static Typeface getTypeface(Context context,
                                   IconSet iconSet)
        Returns a reference to the requested typeface, creating a new instance if none already exists
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        iconSet - the icon typeface
        Returns:
        a reference to the typeface instance

      • registerDefaultIconSets

        public static void registerDefaultIconSets()
        Registers instances of the Default IconSets so that they are available throughout the whole application. Currently the default icon sets include FontAwesome and Typicon.

      • registerCustomIconSet

        public static void registerCustomIconSet(IconSet iconSet)
        Registers a custom IconSet, so that it is available for use throughout the whole application.
        Parameters:
        iconSet - a custom IconSet

      • retrieveRegisteredIconSet

        public static IconSet retrieveRegisteredIconSet(java.lang.String fontPath,
                                                boolean editMode)
        Retrieves a registered IconSet whose font can be found in the asset directory at the given path
        Parameters:
        fontPath - the given path
        editMode - - whether the view requesting the icon set is displayed in the preview editor
        Returns:
        the registered IconSet instance

      • getRegisteredIconSets

        public static java.util.Collection<IconSet> getRegisteredIconSets()
        Retrieves a collection of all registered IconSets in the application
        Returns:
        a collection of registered IconSets.
